name: Brothers in Arm
description:
Brothers in Arm:  Fight waves of enemies to protect your gem! 

Can be played by 1 or 2 players.  

Single Player Controls: WASD to move and SpaceBar to Attack.  

If you're playing solo you can use 'y' to switch between the playable characters. 

Tip: One character does a lot of damage but has very little hp, while the other can take a few hits but only tickles enemies. 

 Choose your strategy wisely!  Enjoy :)
